Key Match Events: Luka Doncic scored 28 points and grabbed 10 rebounds.
Klay Thompson added 22 points in his Dallas debut.
Chris Paul provided 8 assists for the Spurs.
Victor Wembanyama had 9 rebounds for the Spurs.
Dereck Lively II led the Mavericks with 11 rebounds.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was held at the American Airlines Center in Dallas, TX.
The referees for the game were Josh Tiven, Jason Goldenberg, and Rodney Mott.
